July 27 - 20 in Bilbao, Basque Country, Spain

HACKCANCER: A Datathon where Heatlh and Data Science meet

LEARN MORE REGISTER NOW

The vision

Being diagnosed with cancer sucks, a team of friends in London decided to do something about it and Hack Cancer was born. On October 10th – 11th 2015, forty of the best developers and doctors from around the world, gathered at Google Campus to build products to beat cancer. Now the community decided to keep up with the project and organize the next chapter, a Cancer Datathon.

What to expect

For 5 days from July 27th - 30th 2020 the best techies and doctors from around world, will gather at Bilbao to give the best of themselves for cancer patients. Various multidisciplinary teams will work together to test new machine learning algorithmic approaches to a known diseases, Cancer.

50.000€

Raised for CANCER charity, where there is a Proyect running with a hired person

10 Teams

Interdisciplinar teams worked together to learn, teach and solve problems

1 objective

Beat CANCER

REGISTRATION

This year HackCancer 2020 will be part of EuroSciPy and registration will go through EuroScipy 2020 registration proccess.

So, yes, a ticket to EuroSciPy 2020 will be mandatory to take part for HackCancer 2020

But, THANKS to our caretakers (and some EuroSciPy 2020 sponsors) we will be able to create a special FINAID program for people interested in the HackCancer 2020 Datathon, specially for Mentors, speakers and trainers.

FOLLOW our social networks to stay tunned and get more updated information.

EUROSCIPY 2020 TICKETS

Bizkaia Aretoa. UPV/EHU. Bilbao.

HackCaner 2020 will be at Bizkaia Aretoa. It is an emblematic building designed by the architect Álvaro Siza, who has given priority to "maintaining the scale of the place, respecting cornices and placing the ground floor at the service of the pedestrian, open and permeable, offering views inside with huge wings that integrate the private space in the public area and vice versa".

Google maps link

University of the Basque Country

Avda. Abandoibarra, 3, 48009 Bilbao, Bizkaia, Spain

BECOME A CARETAKER

Become a caretaker

Caretakers will help HackCancer 2020 to happen, helping to Mentors, Instructors and Participants to attend the conference

Caretakers will take care of local ChildHood Cancer. Helping local Society Aspanogi and Research Center Biodonostia.

Be part of the innovation in Healthcare and Cancer Research.
